body_html: Another reason why this is currently a good idea is that onnx-fb-universe tests merge with the HEAD of pytorch at the time the PR is made, i.e. not the current, up-to-date HEAD. Therefore when master happens to be in a bad state when a PR is made, a rebase must occur to make onnxbot happy. CC @bddppq who is fixing this

body: Another reason why this is currently a good idea is that onnx-fb-universe tests merge with the HEAD of pytorch *at the time the PR is made*, i.e. *not the current, up-to-date HEAD*. Therefore when master happens to be in a bad state when a PR is made, a rebase must occur to make onnxbot happy. CC @bddppq who is fixing this
